tourBios.exmtStatus: 14th BUY.COM qualifier at 1999 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the BUY.COM TOUR in 1999...made the cut in three of 20 events in 1999 with his only top-25 finish a T15 at the Dayton Open...ranked ninth in Total Driving (60) and 17th in Driving Distance (289.1)...played on Stanford's 1994 NCAA National Championship team...captain of the Cardinal golf team in 1996-97...named to the All-PAC 10 team in 1997...finished second at the 1998 North Dakota Open...Has three competitive holes-in-one...Was an all-state football player in Minnesota as a high school senior...Plays the cello.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T4th in 2001 at the BUY.COM Tri-Cities Open.
